website_summaries.verdict: A complete formula that thoroughly cleans, polishes and protects. The liquid's odor gets mixed reviews, though, and is a deal breaker for some.
pros: Multi-use formula removes tarnish, cleans dirt, buffs and deposits a protective layer
Works for tableware, jewelry and almost any other kind of silver
Extremely effective and thorough, although it may require some effort
cons: Product has an odor that some cannot stand long enough to do a thorough job polishing

customer_reviews.title: BEST Silver Polish on the Mrkt... Use it for my Silver Trumpets
customer_reviews.text: Considering the fact that I have so much money tied-up in my instruments, I do NOT want to chance a sub-par product when polishing them. Goddard removes the tarnish and leaves a magnificent shine. But more importantly, the polish protects the finish for months, without manifesting tarnish -- as can occur with other products. I will NOT consider using ANY OTHER product other than GODDARD's. My horns look as good as the day I got them.
customer_reviews.author: SturmTiger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent silver polish! does the job done with minimal effort and just a wash cloth. I didn't use any abrasive scrubber or anything and it very easily got decades of tarnish off in a few easy swipes. I didn't even have to let it soak or anything. Just make sure to wear gloves when cleaning and use rags you don't care about.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Make old Rings look New
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of rings that I knew were silver but did not look silver--I ordered the polish and put just a little on a soft cloth and rubbed the rings lightly. I now have two new shiny silver rings made of half dollars. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: I received the polish very fast and it works super on my silver
customer_reviews.text: I received the polish very fast and it works super on my silver, which was black. Looks like new! Very shiny and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the ad says, cleans, shines and protects in one easy step.
customer_reviews.text: Well maybe the step is not that easy but I found this silver polish to be almost as easy to use as Wrights. I actually prefer working with the cream a bit more than this lotion mix. Nonetheless it is very effective, doesn't smell bad and cleans up quick and easy. I use this to restore my estate sale sterling purchases :)
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Happy silverware lover !
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new go-to silverware polish. It turned a 60 years old tea set into a brand new one. Just apply and polish with a gentle fiber cloth you see results in 10 seconds. I used a small tooth brush for the ornate details. Get ready for some hand workout, but worth it when you see the results.. I am happy I can receive my friends around a sweet Moroccan tea in my new set.
customer_reviews.author: Ilham Weboffice

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell, not strong results
customer_reviews.text: The smell is really bad and it didn't take off the tarnish from the ring I really wanted cleaned. It worked ok on other jewelry, and more than ok on one specific necklace. Even after washing with soap and water, the jewelry still smells a little like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone looking to bring some life back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Removed tarnish from silver dishes fantastically. Would recommend to anyone looking to bring some life back to their silver. Only downside would be the smell. The product has a strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Silver on show saddle was BAD...cleaned up very nice using this with a toothbrush, cloth and a wooden nail stick to get in the grooves
customer_reviews.author: Smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buff away!
customer_reviews.text: It works. It needs to bring more... but it works with silver. Just apply, wait for it to dry on the piece, then buff out and it will leave the shiny silver behind.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gaita

customer_reviews.title: Best Silver cleaner for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works so incredibly well! Just a dab on a dry cloth and then wipe down with a moist warm cloth and will restore your silver jewelry back to brand new. Great value for the ability to clean your jewelry to make look as good as it did when you bought it

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what it is, a silver polish. Those reviews about its smell are exaggerated.

customer_reviews.title: It did the job but was messy
customer_reviews.text: It did polish my silver well and even worked on some of my jewelry, but the smell was horrible, and I got it all over my hands!

customer_reviews.text: I have used this polish for years and have found it superior to anything else I've tried, I'd recommend it to anyone for ease of use and resulting long lasting protective shine on the silver.

customer_reviews.text: Used this on my silver jewelry that was tarnished and poof the tarnish was gone with very little effort. Highly recommended. Thank you!!!

customer_reviews.text: I did not have good results with this product. Used per directions. Tarnish on silver was not removed well.

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Goddard's is the best! easy and quick to use and doesn't smell horrible like some cleaners do. try to keep some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: An excellent choice for them that must polish
customer_reviews.text: If you must polish silver, which I hate to do, this is as good as a polish can be. It involves very little rubbing and leaves a lovely shine which lasts for a very long time. I have not found a polish any better although for flatware I still use the aluminum-lined pan, the sprinkle of baking soda, and the boiling water technique -- which works like a miracle. But for large pieces, get the Goddard's.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise, not great for removing tarnish
customer_reviews.text: I don't polish much Silver, this is the 3rd bottle of Silver Polish I have used in my lifetime (I'm a senior), and by far the worst product I have ever used. Thankfully there was some paste left in my previous bottle [used to be liquid] and I was able to get dig it out. I doubt I can return this as it took me too long to use it and realize how poorly it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Meme P

customer_reviews.title: Great for jobs where strength is required but you don't have any
customer_reviews.text: Have a silver and art glass perfume bottle with a troublesome rose on it, and rounded parts. have been trying to find something to clean it with that didn't require a lot of hand strength, and wasn't having much luck. This worked great! Follow directions, I used way more than I needed to. Be a little patient on really hard tarnish, let it sit and gently buff with clean part of rag as much as the coated part of rag. It will work.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Suko

customer_reviews.title: Amazing silver Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner/polish is amazing... It doesn't take heavy scrubbing to remove tarnish but as other reviewers noted , keep using clean cloth
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: Super strong fumes burns eyes and nose.. How toxic are these?
customer_reviews.text: Very strong odor and fumes. Near impossible to clean anything without feeling the burning sensation in your nose and eyes. I used gloves and a face mask, and was still struggling to sit with it long enough to clean it. There have to be other products out there are not as toxic as this. Giving it 2 stars instead of 1 because it did what it was supposed to.. Cleaned our silverware like it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Sp272

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this polish to use on a vintage tea tray I found in my grandma's attic. While the product did make the tray more shiny it did not remove all the tarnish as much as I would have liked. I used about half the bottle on the tra and really had to use some muscle to get out what I did. I have used other products in the past that were much more effective. I wasn't overly disappointed by it because like I said it did remove most of the tarnish but I was not wowed by this product by any means, it was just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Ralbovsky

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: The polish did not remove stubborn tarnish. Not happy with this product.

customer_reviews.title: GODDARDS LONG SHINE POLISH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Usually Goddard is great.

product_meta.title: Goddard's Silver Polish Liquid, 7-oz Tarnish Remover
feature_bullets: IALL-IN-ONE CLEANSER - Goddard's Silver Polish Liquid is an all-in-one cleanser designed to clean, shine, and protect all silver products, including jewelry, accessories, plated wares, and other home items. It removes the grime and dirt from necklaces, earrings, bracelets, serving trays, tea sets, candlesticks, utensils, and other silver surfaces.

TOUGH STAIN REMOVER - Tarnishing occurs in sterling silver and low-purity silverwares due to natural oxidation. With Goddard's Silver Polish Liquid, you'll no longer have dull and dirty silver, as this tough stain remover can easily dissolve a silver's tarnish in an instant.

QUICK-SHINE FORMULA - Restore your precious silver in no time with this silver liquid polish. It features a quick-shine formula that refurbishes your silver, returning its natural gleam and shine. Goddard's helps maintain your silver's lustrous beauty.

EASY TO USE - You don't have to pay for a professional silverware cleaner-with Goddard's, you can polish your silver yourself. This polisher doesn't require rubbing or buffing since it instantly dissolves tarnish and dirt in one easy step. Simply apply the polish with a clean, soft cloth until all tarnish is gone. Then, allow the polish to dry and wipe the silver with a clean, soft cloth. For ornate silver, rinse the polish off with a wet sponge and let it dry.

LONG-LASTING PROTECTION - Goddard's has over 170 years of experience in the polishing business. This polish not only restores silver pieces to their original state-it also provides long-lasting protection as it fights off tarnish and other forms of deterioration. This 7-oz product, which is certified Kosher and made in the U.S., is guaranteed to be worth your money.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars295 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
